phrase.item: Let's go to Wukh-homeland, Wukh-homeland is my soul and body.
Don't say bad things about Wukh-homeland, God has given [it] to us.
Look at Wukh-homeland, Wukh-homeland is so beautiful.
God gave us Wukh-homeland in this world.
Wukh-homeland's mountains are covered in gold and ruby and diamond,
Not one of its stones is bad, God has given [it] to us.
If someone says about Wukh-homeland [that] on both sides the mountains are high.
It has many shrines and they are guardians for the mountains.
The footsteps of the holy people, God has given us.
